author: bodewig
msg: Added an antcall task as a shortcut for ant tasks invoked on the same

author: bodewig
msg: Added support for patternset and patternsetref to MatchingTask.

author: bodewig
msg: Added a nested patternsetref element to fileset.

author: bodewig
msg: Better support for subbuilds in XmlLogger. Output of XmlLogger can be
sent to another file using the XmlLogger.file property.

author: bodewig
msg: Workaround for a problem when compiling many files on Windows.
I've modified Matt's patch a little to kick in only if we are actually
running on Windows and want to compile a lot of files.
Unfortunately File.createTempFile is not available on JDK 1.1. I use
java.util.Random to create a hopefully unique filename for a temporary
file. Hope this works - don't have a Windows box to check.
